creator: Apps for Philips Hue @ A Better Home, LLC
descriptionHtml:
DOUBLE the value of your PHILIPS HUE lights.
Enjoy a FREE Scene every week!

This is the ULTIMATE HUE APP!
We're listening to YOUR feedback and improving the app for you.

★ THE FASTEST GROWING LIGHTING APP! ★
Enjoy a FREE scene every week. Other apps can't afford to do that. We work harder.
Be a lighting expert in just one TAP!

INSTALL a new mood every week IN ONE TAP!

★ SIMPLE ENOUGH TO USE IT DAILY ★
Lighter for Philips Hue mixes everyone's favorite classical lighting with the best enhancements App Store has to offer.
Wake up to an energizing sunrise, relax to a sunset on the beach, or set a warm summer mood even if you're buried under snow in Alaska!

Use your Philips Hue lights to replicate the colors of old bulbs, have a candle lit dinner or turn your smart home into a disco.
Marvel at our ever expanding selection of professionally designed dynamic lighting scenes!

Make your Philips Hue lights come to life like never before!

★ ROOMS & LIGHT GROUPS★
Everyday use: Manage your rooms with the best Philips Hue app!
Advanced use: Create & manage light groups to complement your rooms, and have ULTIMATE CONTROL over your lighting!

Philips Hue Lighter uses the Official Philips Hue app API to sync groups on your Philips Hue Bridge, which makes it compatible with most Philips Hue apps.

★ LET'S BUILD THE HOME OF THE FUTURE TOGETHER! ★
Join our community and share your ideas inside the app!
TELL US which features you would like us to build for your Philips Hue lights.

★ FREE ★
INSTALL Lighter for FREE today and let us know what you think!

DISCLAIMER
You need to like fun and have a Philips Hue system (Philips Hue Bridge & compatible lights) to use this app.

★ FREE ★

Enjoy a FREE Scene every week!

★ THE FASTEST GROWING LIGHTING APP! ★
Enjoy a FREE scene every week. Other apps can't afford to do that. We work harder.
Be a lighting expert in just one TAP!

INSTALL a new mood every week IN ONE TAP!

★ SIMPLE ENOUGH TO USE IT DAILY ★
Lighter for Philips Hue mixes everyone's favorite classical lighting with the best enhancements App Store has to offer.
Wake up to an energizing sunrise, relax to a sunset on the beach, or set a warm summer mood even if you're buried under snow in Alaska!

Use your Philips Hue lights to replicate the colors of old bulbs, have a candle lit dinner or turn your smart home into a disco.
Marvel at our ever expanding selection of professionally designed dynamic lighting scenes!

Make your Philips Hue lights come to life like never before!

★ ROOMS & LIGHT GROUPS★
Everyday use: Manage your rooms with the best Philips Hue app!
Advanced use: Create & manage light groups to complement your rooms, and have ULTIMATE CONTROL over your lighting!

Philips Hue Lighter uses the Official Philips Hue app API to sync groups on your Philips Hue Bridge, which makes it compatible with most Philips Hue apps.

★ LET'S BUILD THE HOME OF THE FUTURE TOGETHER! ★
Join our community and share your ideas inside the app!
TELL US which features you would like us to build for your Philips Hue lights.

★ FREE ★
INSTALL Lighter for FREE today and let us know what you think!

You need to like fun and have a Philips Hue system (Philips Hue Bridge & compatible lights) to use this app.
